vote.title: Authorize a one-year service contract in the amount of $50,000, with four one-year renewal options in the amount of $50,000 for each renewal period, for administration of the international protocol services program for the Office of Government Affairs - World Affairs Council of Dallas/Fort Worth, most advantageous proposer of two - Total not to exceed $250,000 - Financing:  General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a one-year service contract in the amount of $50,000, with four one-year renewal options in the amount of $50,000 for each renewal period, for administration of the international protocol services program for the Office of Government Affairs - World Affairs Council of Dallas/Fort Worth, most advantageous proposer of two - Total not to exceed $250,000 - Financing:  General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
